Headline: #91 Austin Temporary Reroute at Austin/Belden
ShortDescription: 91 Austin buses rerouted in both directions via Austin, Fullerton, Narragansett, Grand, over normal route on Austin, due to construction near Austin/Belden.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Austin, Fullerton, Narragansett, Grand and then resume their normal route on Austin, due to construction near Austin/Belden.

Allow extra travel time.
